Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Herm Greider <animate123@...>

A couple of kind folks aimed me at the TestSetup 
decorator a couple of weeks ago to run setup code 
for a block of tests. 

This works great except for one annoyance. In the
swingui.TestRunner, under the Test Hierarchy tab,
the TestSetup and the tests it wraps show up as:

    junit.framework.TestSuite

With no drill-down possible. Is this by design?

It is really nothing more than an annoyance. But
it would be nice to be able to run the complete 
TestSuite and then pick specific tests from the
hierarchy tab and run them directly to isolate 
failures without starting a separate GUI.

Herm Greider
Lexis-Nexis
Dayton, Ohio

subject: TestSetup decorator with swingui.TestRunner
